name: Hacker News Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Hacker News Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Hacker News API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Hacker News API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: article

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get
available_options: Get (值: get) - Get a Hacker News user

articleId.name: articleId
articleId.description: The ID of the Hacker News article to be returned
articleId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Article ID | 作用: The ID of the Hacker News article to be returned | (必填项)

username.name: username
username.description: The Hacker News user to be returned
username.natural_language_description: 参数名: Username | 作用: The Hacker News user to be returned | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: keyword (值: None) - The keyword for filtering the results of the query
tags (值: None) - Tags for filtering the results of the query
